# Third Party Libraries

## libtomcrypt
- https://www.libtom.net/LibTomCrypt/
- Version 1.18.2

## libtommath
- https://www.libtom.net/LibTomMath/
- Version 1.1.0

## minilzo
- http://www.oberhumer.com/opensource/lzo/
- Version 2.10

## minizip
- https://www.zlib.net/
- Version 1.2.11 (Zlib)

## Salsa20
- https://cr.yp.to/snuffle.html
- Based on the reference implementation 20051118

## zlib
- https://www.zlib.net/
- Version 1.2.11
